If an income verification form is received and the claims folder reveals that EP 154 or 314 was cleared, dispose of this form under the appropriate Administrative Support Staff directive.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
